member.name: T:ZimLabs.Mapper.IgnorePropertyAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to mark that a property should be ignored

member.name: T:ZimLabs.Mapper.Mapper
member.summary: Provides the functions to map two objects

member.name: M:ZimLabs.Mapper.Mapper.Map``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Maps the values of the properties of object into the properties of the object
member.typeparam: The type of the target object
The type of the source object
member.param: The target object, which takes over the values from the source object
The source object that provides the values for the target object
member.exception: Will be thrown when the target or the source is null

member.name: M:ZimLabs.Mapper.Mapper.CreateAndMap``2(``1)
member.summary: Maps the values of the properties of object into the properties of the new created target object
member.typeparam: The type of the target object
The type of the source object
member.param: The source object that provides the values for the target object
member.exception: Will be thrown when the source is null

member.name: M:ZimLabs.Mapper.Mapper.IgnoreProperty(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Checks if the property should be ignored
member.returns: true when the property should be ignore, otherwise false
